summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Bagley Avenue from Northlake Avenue to a pouch about 178 ft north of No. 46" Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 19659, creating Local Improvement District No. 1906 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
